segments.text: Excuse me , what's the charge for a picture ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 1 . You can get your photos instantly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Give me the landscape of the Triumphal for the background .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Say ' cheese ' . That's good . Please wait a moment .
